entities.name: resurrection stone
entities.description: The Resurrection Stone is mentioned as a magical object with the power to bring back the dead. It is described as being able to raise people from the dead, but Hermione corrects Harry that it doesn't truly bring them back to life.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as a person who was connected with Harry's wand, and whose connection brought back Harry's parents and Cedric. However, Hermione clarifies that they weren't really back from the dead.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is skeptical of the Resurrection Stone's power to bring back the dead. She explains that it only brings back pale imitations of people.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who was present in the conversation and was looked at by Hermione with concern and fear.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is mentioned as a location where Peverell is buried.

relationships.description: The Resurrection Stone was connected to You-Know-Who, and this connection brought back Harry's parents and Cedric.
Hermione showed concern and fear towards Ron when he talked about living with dead people.
